abstract.t: This document describes in detail the WCOR ("Welcomed Correspondence", or WC/WCor for short) extension to IMAP. "Welcomed Correspondence" is explained in detail in Internet-Draft draft-szego-wcor-overview-00.txt [WCor-Overview]. This extension is based on the standard IMAP "Client Commands - Experimental / Expansion" described in RFC 3501 [RFC3501] section 6.5. Welcomed Correspondence capabilities are identified by the WCOR keyword in the IMAP capabilities list presented by a WC-Compliant IMAP server implementation.
